mapper.select: select auth.identifier, auth.identity_type, auth.certificate, member.member_type, member.id as memberId, member.university_id, member.city_id, base.id as uid, base.user_status, base.username, base.nick_name, base.email, base.mobile, base.birthday, base.gender from user_base base left join user_auth auth on base.id = auth.user_base_id left join member member on base.id = member.user_base_id where base.del_flag = 0 and auth.identifier = #{queryObj.identifier} and auth.identity_type = #{queryObj.identityType}
